articles.description:
Re rugged by $NYAN (first arbitrum yield farm) would indeed be a funny one to reward early adopters 😝
Abruzy.eth(💙,🧡) Abruzy.lens🦇🔊(🌸, 🌿)(L3, ❄️): $ARBI airdrop be like
1. Early users —> 1,000 
2. Got rugged by NYAN—> 1,000
3. Got rugged by Z2O —> 1,000
4. Got rugged by CARBON —> 1,000
5. Got rugged by ARBIS —> 1,000
5. Bonus for hitting multiple categories —>7,000
Congratulations you got 12,000 $ARBI

🚨 CONFIRMED AIRDROP 🚨
@SwaapFinance is a DEX on @0xPolygon pioneering a new AMM model using oracles and dynamic fees.
It eliminates impermanent loss for LP's of high-volume assets like $ETH, $WBTC etc. by quoting the spot prices on centralized exchanges.

articles.description:

Why 0%? 👇
